title: Memora
techStack: React.js, Node.js, Python, Git, AWS Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB
projectSummary: A flashcard-based learning app for tech enthusiasts. Has multiple topics in tech such as Java, DSA, OOP, C#, Python, etc.

title: CodeQuiz
techStack: React.js, Bootstrap CSS, HTML, AWS Lambda, API GATEWAY (REST), DynamoDB, Amplify, Git
projectSummary: A web design where tech enthusiasts test their technical knowledge by taking quizzes. App has quizzes for multiple levels - Easy, Medium, and Hard.

title: ToDo-App
projectSummary: Developed a dynamic ToDo app using React.js. Has the functionality to add and delete tasks, and the tasks are indexed and sorted according to the indexes automatically.

title: World Clock
projectSummary: Built a world clock app that shows the exact date and time in the selected location (city) using React.js.
